inclusion.criterion: ≤ completed gestational week 10 after ART with the present partner or with an egg/semen donor
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: ≥2 previous pregnancies with fetuses with known abnormal karyotype
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with IgA deficiency, IgA-autoantibodies or hyperprolinaemia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with medication interacting with prednisolone
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 47-year-old Asian woman complaining of persistent feelings of sadness. She lost interest in activities she used to enjoy.
